citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks, Sea Grant College Program
citeinfo.title: Ecology of the Bering Sea: A Review of Russian Literature

abstract.p: Russian literature addressing various topics of the Bering Sea ecosystem.
[Reference: Mathiesen, O.A. and K.O. Coyle (eds.). 1996. Ecology of the Bering Sea: A Review of Russian Literature. Alaska Sea Grant College Program Report No. 96-01, University of Alaska Fairbanks.]
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: To make available the results of Russian studies of the Bering Sea ecosystem to North American scientists not conversant in the Russian language. The book is the result of a contract signed in July 1993 between the US Dept. of State and the school of Fisheries and Ocean Science, University of Alaska, Fairbanks. Dr. O.A. Mathisen became the principle investigator of this joint US - Russia Bering Sea Studies project.
